Description.: Red Axes, the Tel Aviv-based duo of Niv Arzi and Dori
Sadovnik release their debut full length courtesy of
French imprint I'm A Cliche. Battle Of The Ice follows
several strong EP's for the Parisian label, and finds
the production partners stretching out and expounding
on their post-punkcold-wave indebted sound. They try
on early-80's styles like hats, tackling skanky dub on
Only A Clown Can Catch An Axe", pre-programmed
loungeBossa Nova on "Papa Sooma" and Italian proto
house on "Road To The Hills". Other highlights include
the sleazy, cowbell-laced"Kicks Out Of You" and
spirited Bauhaus cover "Bela Lugosi's Dead
